items.name: Bryndzové Halušky
items.description: Traditional Slovak potato dumplings with sheep cheese and bacon

items.name:
"Bryndzové Halušky" is a traditional Slovak dish made of potato dumplings with sheep cheese. 
To avoid confusion, a different name suggestion for this item in the "Appetizers" category could be "Slovak Potato Dumplings with Sheep Cheese".
items.description: Traditional Slovak potato dumplings with sheep cheese sauce and bacon

items.name: "Bryndzové Halušky" can be renamed to "Slovak Potato Dumplings with Sheep Cheese"
